Name: Repair the Lighthouse at the Wuming Bay
Description: The lighthouse at the Wuming Bay has lost power. Try to restore its power!
QuestDesc: The lighthouse at the Wuming Bay has lost power. Try to restore its power!

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh... Still can't do it...

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was assigned to this power station to restore power of that lighthouse on the hill.

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everything else was swiftly taken care of for a genius such as myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Little did I expect to get stuck at the final step of turning on the power...

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This power station utilizes a pulsed power supply system. After the battery is installed, the circuit must be fully connected within a certain time frame.

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In order to complete the connection, the pylons along the circuit must be activated using physical force in sequential order within the time limit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unfortunately, I was only bestowed with a genius brain but not strong physiques. I've always been at the bottom in terms of fitness, and I simply can't complete the route in time.

Options.PlotLineKey: I can offer you some help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really?! You would do that? Thank you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's just no way I can activate all the pylons leading up to the lighthouse within such a short time period...

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's proving to be a bit harder than expected, huh? Want to give it another go, Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just reinstall the power unit and the electromagnetic pulse will start its count down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Try to pick up the pace a notch this time. I'm counting on you, Rover!

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: H-Hello? Rover, can you hear me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Infrastructure Division Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The electromagnetic pulse just went out... I guess you didn't make it in time. You should come back for another run.

Dialogues.Speaker: Beacon Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Verifying Ship Registration>>>>> Extracting latest log entry—Complete

Dialogues.Speaker: Beacon Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ship Registration [NUS8910]>>>>> Initiating voice recording

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stingray here... Acting Captain Moak recording...

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I say Captain, but I'm actually the only one left on this ship. This morning, Espey, my last companion, also quietly left the Stingray unnoticed.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was already late evening when we found this lighthouse on the mountain yesterday, so we made an approach and prepared to go on land and check the place out after dawn, as we have done in the past.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It wasn't until dawn that I found Espey had already gone missing... I'd thought that he had escaped with all the remaining supplies.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I was quickly put to shame by my own suspicions—the supplies were untouched. Espey left them all for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He knew fully well that the remaining supplies weren't enough to support two people on sea, so he left the last hopes of life to me and went ashore to seek for survival.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What an idiot... Even if we both were to die at sea, I would never have the thought of abandoning my crew.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So I left some supplies at these coordinates, hoping that they would be useful to him... From here on out, this will be the final voyage for me and the Stingray.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (A set of coordinates appeared on-screen after the recording.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should check out these coordinates I see what I can find.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (This looks like a console I can hack into, but its powerline has been cut off.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Next to the console you find a notice sheet that seems fairly recent.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should search along the slope down from the lighthouse. There should be some clues at the power station.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Made it. That should restore the lighthouse's power.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Head back to the lighthouse and hack into the console.)
